name: Nox Anima
description:
"Welcome to the Ruins, traveler"

... are the first words you see as you enter the ruins. But what awaits the player in this crumbled place?

Nox Anima is a classic 2D metroidvania game with stunning 3D graphics, amazing music and great platforming. Explore the ruins, fight enemies and earn new mechanics to advance.

Can you make it to the Final Tomb? Download our demo and find out:)

Made during the GameCamp 2020 in TAMK Games Academy.
